content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: observer
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "wheat_seeds", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 45}]

thought: I need to craft an observer. To do that I first need to craft redstone. To craft redstone, I need to craft a redstone block. I have a redstone block in slot 10, so I will move it to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
